Note.name: Note_3
Note.comment:
We need to stage the natural keys for Region and/or State, Project, Program and Process in order to create a record in BPM_EVENT_MASTER.

For now, PROJECT_XXX AND SITE_XXX has been added as a placeholder. The assumption is that PROGRAM can be derived from PROJECT and STATE and REGION can be derived from SITE and/or PROJECT.

SITE is not included in the Ops Production Planning model. Is this by design?
